ok this is a bit confusing but i really need help with it.
So ive created when you go in this room it sets off a timer when that timer expires it creates lots of rooms then it sets off another timer.
You must go to the right room otherwise you will go in a room and will take you back out..... but when i go back in the same room obviosly itll set off the first timer again then when u do go in the good room the 2nd timer carries on making u lose

Bit confusin i know but can anyone out there please help
Process is
Go in room-set off timer 7 sec
7 sec expires creates rooms goin in all directions sets off 2nd timer 7 sec if expires itll kill you
go in wrong room then go in room then come bak out
go in right room 2nd timer will continue killing you even though its meant to go off when u enter the room...
